subject: Steroids

Baseball

lead_paragraph: Brian McNamee will answer questions from Congressional investigators  Thursday while his former client, Roger Clemens, meets one-on-one with members of the House Oversight committee.
snippet: Brian McNamee will answer questions from Congressional investigators  Thursday while his former client, Roger Clemens, meets one-on-one with members of the House Oversight committee.
